Name: Happy New Hentai
About the game: Happy New Hentai is a puzzle game with a new year mood, you need to move parts of the image to restore the drawing. Beautiful visual style and festive music will relax you and lift your mood. Key Features Soft background colors and simple interface Beautiful art Great soundtrack The atmosphere of the occasion You can play with one hand
